articles.author: JENNIFER McDERMOTT
articles.title: American boat patrols waters around new offshore wind farms to protect jobs - The Associated Press
articles.description: Off the Northeast U.S. coast, signs of the nascent wind industry are all around. Giant upright steel tubes poke from the water, waiting for ships to attach towers and turbines that will make electricity from the force of the wind blowing. Lately, a battleship…
articles.content: NEW BEDFORD, Massachusetts (AP) One early morning this week in ocean waters off the coasts of Rhode Island and New York, signs of the nascent wind industry were all around. Giant upright steel tubes … [+8868 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: BTS' Jungkook says he isn't well, his health ‘got worse' after landing in US - Hindustan Times
articles.description: BTS: Jungkook, after reaching US, performed for Good Morning America. The singer has now said that he isn't doing well.
articles.content: BTS member Jungkook performed in New York on Good Morning America's Summer Concert Series amid bad weather. He is the first K-pop solo artist to perform at the GMA. Jungkook's show came just hours af… [+3041 chars]

articles.title: Extreme weather plagues U.S. - CGTN America
